Text: Oñ ogu dʼagbagba unyi So̩l kpai unyi Defid kpo̩kpe̩ kpo̩kpe̩; ukpahiu Defid la anyo̩gba o̩gba, ukpahiu abo unyi So̩l nabulo̩ waa.
Ma la fʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi ñwu Defid Hebro̩n. Ahinoam, ene Je̩zree̩l bi Amno̩n o̩mo̩gba-wñ ñw u;
ekeji-wñ che Chileab, kʼAbige̩l, o̩ya Nabal e̩ne̩ Karme̩l le̩, bi ñw u; e̩ke̩ta la chʼAbsalom, o̩ma Maaka kʼi chʼo̩ma Talmai, onu Ge̩shur;
e-e̩ke̩le̩ la chʼAdonija o̩ma Hagit; e̩ke̩lu-ma la che Shefatia o̩ma Abital;
e̩ke̩fa la chʼItream e-kʼE̩gla, o̩ya Defid, bi ñw u. Abo-i ma bi ñwu Defid He̩bro̩n.
Oñ abu kʼogu dʼagbagba unyi So̩l kpai unyi Defid, Abina nache kʼo̩wo̩-wñ ki gbiti ef unyi So̩l.
Abadu So̩l oka la do̩mo̩ kʼodu-wñ ko̩ Rizpa, o̩ma Aya; oñ Ishbo̩she̩t dʼo̩la bi Abina kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ bʼabadu ata-mi dachi?

O̩la Ishbo̩she̩t le̩ la wo̩ Abina nana, oñ i kakini, Oji abia e-abo Juda omi che? Eñini kide̩ omi dʼemi achʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpʼunyi So̩l ata-we̩ kpʼamo̩maye-wñ kpʼamonuku-wñ kʼu ma la mʼe̩ du tef o̩wo̩ Defid in; uwe̩ muda adʼudu ugbo onobule̩-i ñwu mi eñini-i kpo̩.
O̩jo̩ ki fʼabe̩le̩ che Abina, kpai e-ki tʼabe̩i le ta, iche̩wñ kʼomi ma che alu ku Jihofa go̩ ñwu Defid in;
kʼi gba o̩fe̩ kwʼo̩wo̩ abo unyi So̩l, kʼi la dʼede Defid kwane̩ kʼi nʼo̩da Israe̩l kpai Juda, akwo Dan gbogbo wa Birshiba.
I la neke dʼohi omune̩ du ñwu Abina n, todu i railo owñ.
Tak Abina fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo Defid ugbo kʼi de̩, kakini, E̩ne̩ nʼane̩-i ta? I ño̩ kakini, Chʼalu kpai omi, e̩ go, tak o̩wo̩-mi ado̩mo̩ kpʼuwe̩, kʼu kʼabo Israe̩l chaka ñw e̩.
Oñ i kakini, I nyo̩, nachʼalu kpʼuwe̩; i muda nʼe̩wñʼka kʼu natene ugbo-we̩ ta: owñ de̩ kakini, Uwe̩ ali eju-mi n, chai e̩gba kʼe̩ du Maikal o̩ma So̩l, wa ejodudu, takʼe̩ wa kʼe̩ li eju-mi.
Taku Defid fʼamonuche kpe̩ rʼIshbo̩she̩t, o̩ma So̩l, kakini, Du Maikal, o̩ya-mi, ñwu mi, owñ chʼe-kʼu kʼaño̩ ki bʼoj e̩pi abo Filistra ogume̩lu ma wa chʼana-wñ le̩.
Tak Ishbo̩she̩t, fʼonuche̩ kpe̩, oñ i mʼu gba bʼo̩ko̩-wñ o̩wo̩ te̩, owñ che Paltie̩l o̩ma Laish le̩.
O̩ko̩-wñ la lebʼo̩, i naraku abu kʼi alo oñ i tʼo̩ ubi nyi Bahurim. Tak Abina ka ñw u kakini, Mudabi alo; oñ i mudabi.
Tak Abina fʼoluka che kpai abogijo Israe̩l, i kakini, Igbelegbele me̩ te̩te̩-tene Defid kʼi jʼonu me̩ akwoubi.
Me̩ che abajo̩-i ke; todu Jihofa fʼo̩la Defid ka kakini, O̩wo̩ adu-mi Defid oñ nadu gba amone̩-mi Israe̩l kwef o̩wo̩ abo Filistia, kpai kwef o̩wo̩ ame̩nebi-ma chaka.
Tak Abina ño̩ ko̩la nyʼabo Be̩njamin eti; oñ Abina ño̩ le kʼi ka e̩wñ du ki nyo̩ abo Israe̩l kpʼo̩gbo̩ abo unyi Be̩njamin du eju le̩ nyu Defid eti He̩bro̩n.
Abe̩le̩ Abina lewa He̩bro̩n ugbo Defid, one̩ ogu la jʼugbo-wñ. Taku Defid fʼo̩je̩ ojo hi ñw Abina kpai aboke̩le̩ ku ma jʼugbo-wñ.

Tak Abina ka ñwu Defid kakini, Omi akwane̩ alo, kʼu kʼabo Israe̩l chaka wa ñw odu-mi onu, kʼama ki chʼalu kpʼuwe̩, kʼuwe̩ ki jʼonu alu du kʼonugo-we̩ neku. Taku Defid je̩ ñw Abina ki lo; oñ i le ef ure̩do̩.
E̩ la go, abo Defid kpai Joab doji kwʼoko ejakpa wa, oñ ma nʼane̩ ku ma dinya wa nana nana; Abina la dʼugbo Defid He̩bro̩n e̩gba le̩ n; todu i je̩ ñw u kwʼo̩mo̩ lo, i la le ef ure̩do̩.
E̩gba ku Joab kpʼabogu du ku ma jʼugbo-wñ lewa, ma mudu ka ñwu Joab kakini, Abina, o̩ma Ne̩r le̩ wʼugbo onu, i ño̩ je̩ ñw u le, i la le kpʼure̩do̩.
Taku Joab lewʼugbo onu, oñ i kakini, E̩wñ uwe̩ che-i? Go, Abina lewʼugbo we̩; e̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ je̩ ñw u lo, kʼi la le owñ pio?
Uwe̩ chema Abina, o̩ma Ne̩r le̩, ka kʼi wa kʼi dʼuwe̩ ibe, kʼi la fʼedufu-we̩ kpai ewa-we̩ ma, kʼi ño̩ ma e̩wñ du kʼuwe̩ ache.
Tak e̩gba ku Joab kwʼugbo Defid dufu wa, i fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ rano Abina, oñ ma mʼowñ du dabi kwʼobuga Sira wa; Defid muda ma no.
Tak e̩gba ku Abina mudabi wa He̩bro̩n, Joab mʼowñ du tʼo̩wo̩ʼka alumeji alaku, kʼi ko̩la ñw u ye̩ye̩, tak i fʼe̩wñ ro̩nyʼu o̩la o̩mo̩, oñ i leku, tod e̩bie̩ Asahe̩l o̩maye-wñ.
Tak anubile̩, e̩gba ku Defid gbo̩, i kakini, Omi kpai abojane̩-mi nʼudu o̩gba Jihofa ugbo e̩bie̩ Abina, o̩ma Ne̩r le̩, ogbegbele̩ n.

I ki wane̩ abʼoji Joab kpʼabo unyi ata-wñ chaka ma; e̩ne̩ kʼo̩la-wñ awʼe̩ño̩, abe̩k e̩ne̩ kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ ikpemute, abe̩k e̩ne̩ kʼi anʼo̩kpa lule̩, abe̩k e̩ne̩ kʼugbada agwoda jʼane̩, abe̩k e̩ne̩ kʼuje̩wñ anyarʼu kʼi we edʼef abo unyi Joab in.
Abe̩le̩ Joab kpai Abishai, o̩maye-wñ kpa Abina, todabu kʼi fʼo̩maye-ma Asahe̩l kpa Gibe̩o̩n, ef ogu le̩.
Taku Defid ka ñw Joab kpai amone̩ du ku ma jʼugbo-wñ kakini, Me̩ fʼe̩wñ o̩la-me̩ fana, me̩ kʼe̩gbanukpo nyʼo̩la, ku me̩ daido̩ o̩gba Abina. Taku Defid onu le̩ tʼokuegu le̩ ubi.
Oñ ma du Abina ji He̩bro̩n; tak onu chi omu-wñ nyate̩ araku ugbo ura Abina; amone̩ chaka ño̩ raku ge̩.
Tak onu fʼinaku da tod Abina, kakini,
Ma kʼiku nyʼuwe̩ o̩wo̩ n,

Tak amone̩ le̩ chaka wʼugbo Defid ku ma je ñw u jʼuje̩wñ abu kʼolu bo̩; ama Defid fʼO̩jo̩ go̩ kakini, O̩jo̩ ki fʼabe̩le̩ che mi, kpai e-ki tʼe-i le ge̩, iche̩wñ kʼu dʼakala kpai e̩wñ du ki bo̩ kad alu gbogbo tak olu ki tunyʼane̩.
Amone̩ le̩ chaka la li, oñ i rʼuma eju; alu kʼe̩wñ du kʼonu che cherʼamone̩ le̩ du eju.
Abe̩le̩ amone̩ le̩ kpai abo Israe̩l chaka ma ka kʼibe dʼefu onu kʼi dʼAbina o̩ma Ne̩r kpa n.
Tak onu ka ñw abo-wñ kakini, Ame̩ chema ka kʼagboji kpai e̩ne̩ lile lewane̩ ane̩ Israe̩l eñini n?
Omi la ño̩ chʼe̩ne̩ aule̩ eñini, dagba ma dʼekpo tʼumi oji kʼu chʼonu; abo-i, owñ chʼamo̩ma Ze̩ruaya-i, gbiti tʼumi le: Jihofa ki rʼo̩me̩ ñw ache̩bie̩ne̩ le̩ teju alu kʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩-wñ de̩!
